name: Impossible Space Shooter - Endless Galaxy Game Arcade
name_original: Impossible Space Shooter - Endless Galaxy Game Arcade
description:
Impossible Space Shooter is endless galactic arcade shooter! What is the highest score you can get?

Prepare yourself for this near impossible shooter in the world of Impossible Space Shooter. Push your skills to the limit as you shot your way through space, whilst avoiding stars, planets and asteroids!

One touch game play with endless boundaries that will keep you entertained for hours!

Game Features:
• Endless Impossible Space Shooter arcade game;
• High score records;
• Collect boosts for the ultimate destruction;
• Simple yet stunning graphics and game play;
• No one game is the same; and
• GameCenter integration, so you can annihilate your friends!

Challenge yourself with this near impossible, endless galactic space shooter game!
